author: Anonymous
content: FYI - the California bill mentioned in the "Tom is not your friend" video is NOT SB-186 - it is SB-1386.

author: Jonathan
content:
Actually, it is SB-186, not SB-1386. See this link:
http://info.sen.ca.gov/pub/03-04/bill/sen/sb_0151-0200/sb_186_bill_20030911_enrolled.html

author: Annonymous
content: Wow, this is perfect to help me on my paper on the history and cons of Myspace... thank you.
